entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 5:13 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:13 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:13 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
